TextEng: You can hand over your belongings -- now!
Never mind. I have more pressing business.
I'm not interested in your fire, but I have questions.
Thank you. I appreciate the hospitality.
I prefer to ask the questions here.
I should go.
Why are you here in the foothills?
Who are you?
Arcane archer?
Tell me what happened here.
I have some other questions.
Tell me about this elven crypt.
Did you see anything else?
Did you see where that one went?
What did the gnolls do after the battle?
Where do you think they were going?
You didn't intervene or chase after them?
What can you tell me about this area?
Text: 이 지역에 대해 뭘 알려줄 수 있어?

TextEng: I noticed some unusual deer tracks nearby.  Do you know anything of them?
Text: 근처에서 이상한 사슴 발자국을 봤는데. 뭔지 알아?

TextEng: Shadow Hart?
Well, good luck on that.
Perhaps I could help you find this creature.
Text: 그 생명체를 찾는 걸 도와줄 수도 있어.

TextEng: Doesn't it seem wrong to kill one thing to save another?
Text: 무언가를 살리려고 다른 걸 죽이는 게 잘못된 것 같지 않아?

TextEng: How does one hunt a beast who disappears?
Are these the horns you're looking for?
<StartCheck>[Persuade]</Start> Would you tell me the story behind the elven crypt?
Is it very dangerous to enter?
So the rest of the elves hated Ascalhorn?
Text: 그래서 다른 엘프들은 아스칼혼을 싫어했던 거야?

TextEng: So it's a place of dark magic?
Honored dead? Shouldn't the crypt be in better shape, then?
Text: 명예로운 죽은 자들? 그렇다면 납골당이 더 잘 관리되어 있어야 하는 거 아니야?

TextEng: I have the horns of the Shadow Hart.
These were damn difficult to acquire. Forget it!
I said no! I'm keeping them.
And what kind of reward are you offering?
Alright, here. Take them and go.
Certainly. Take them and return to your wife.
That depends on the reward, really.
I can't take that from you. Here... take the horns.
Text: 그건 받을 수 없어. 여기... 뿔을 가져가.

TextEng: What do I need your bow for? Offer something else.
Text: 당신 활이 왜 필요해? 다른 걸 제안해.

TextEng: A bow's a good start. What else do you have?
Text: 활은 좋은 시작이야. 또 뭐 있어?

TextEng: Ahhh, I can't stand this anymore. Take the horns, and keep your stupid bow.
Text: 아, 더 못 참겠어. 뿔 가져가고, 그 멍청한 활도 가져.

TextEng: Fine, fine. The bow will have to do.
Nothing else, hey? I'll just hold onto this, then.
Text: 다른 건 없다고? 그럼 그냥 내가 갖고 있을게.

TextEng: I have the Hart's horns... and that's what counts.
Text: 숫사슴 뿔은 내가 갖고 있어... 그게 중요한 거지.

TextEng: A magical bow? That will do.
I am from Hilltop, yes, but my business is my own.
Text: 힐탑에서 왔어, 맞아, 하지만 내 일은 내 일이야.

TextEng: I'm looking for a group of kobolds that attacked Hilltop, actually.
Text: 사실, 힐탑을 공격한 코볼트 무리를 찾고 있어.

TextEng: Yes, tell me what happened.
More dangerous than you think. Hand over your belongings, now!
Text: 생각보다 더 위험한 사람이지. 소지품을 내놔, 당장!

TextEng: Fine. Forget it, then.
<StartCheck>[Intimidate]</Start> But elves make fine bows and arrows. Hand them over now!
Text: <StartCheck>[위협]</Start> 하지만 엘프들은 좋은 활과 화살을 만들지. 당장 내놔!

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Intimidate]</Start> I could always search your corpse and see for myself...
Text: <StartCheck>[위협]</Start> 네 시체를 뒤져서 직접 확인해도 되는데...

TextEng: <StartAction>[Attack]</Start> Oh, you'll pay dearly for that mouth of yours!
Text: <StartAction>[공격]</Start> 오, 그 주둥이를 놀린 값은 비싸게 치러야겠어!
